title: Oceanfront Israel Kempinski Retreat on Tel Aviv Promenade
description: At the heart of the city's world-famous promenade, The David Kempinski Tel Aviv stands as a peerless palace of modern Israeli luxury, overlooking the incomparable Mediterranean Sea. Wander just moments to countless iconic sights - including the sprawling Carmel Market and historic Dizengoff Square - and savour Israeli breakfast at Sereia, cigars and scotch at Cohiba Atmosphere or sunlight-kissed afternoons by the hotel’s magnificent pool.

title: Glamorous Tel Aviv Escape  in the Diamond District with Rooftop Infinity Pool
description: Discover opulence and glamour in the heart of Israel’s world-famous gemstone capital with a stay at Hotel Indigo Tel Aviv - Diamond District. Murals depicting history’s most iconic stones lead you into the heart of luxury - savour bagels in the morning and Israeli malt whiskey in the evening at Blackstone Bistro & Lounge, delight in fresh seafood delicacies at David & Yossef or head to the hotel’s dazzling rooftop bar for spectacular Tel Aviv views and oh-so-sippable cocktails.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Tel Aviv - Diamond District
offer_address: Aholiav Street No. 5, Ramat Gan, Tel Aviv 6100100, Israel

vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Tel Aviv City Centre
title: Modern Five-Star Tel Aviv Stay near Sarona Centre & Azrieli Mall
description: The modern and sophisticated Crowne Plaza Tel Aviv City Center, an IHG Hotel, sits in the heart of Tel Aviv, within walking distance of Israel's leading culinary, shopping and cultural complex, Sarona. From this central location, you might take a stroll along Kaplan Street, head out and explore the old town of Jaffa or hop on the hotel's free shuttle bus to the must-see beaches. Or, stay in and enjoy the refreshing swimming pool, fully-equipped fitness centre, indulgent spa and expertly prepared Israeli and international dishes at The 11th Floor restaurant.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Tel Aviv City Center, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 136 Menahem Begin Rd, Tel Aviv, 6701104, Israel

title: Stylish Tel Aviv City Escape near Neve Tzedek with Beachside Pool
description: Discover the treasures of Israel with an escape to InterContinental David Tel Aviv, an IHG Hotel, perfectly positioned between the historic Old City, Neve Tzedek’s bohemian boutiques and the endless shining blue of the Mediterranean Sea. There’s no better retreat after a day exploring the city’s many wonders - enjoy authentic Israeli breakfast at the Atrium Lobby Bar, indulge in exceptional treatments from around the world at The Spa or savour cocktails by the hotel’s shimmering beachside pool.
location_description: InterContinental David Tel Aviv, an IHG Hotel

title: Stylish Tel Aviv City Escape on Fashionable Gordon Beach
description: Fall in love with eye-catching Bauhaus architecture, lose yourself in the lively atmosphere and step onto iconic golden sands with a stay at Crowne Plaza Tel Aviv Beach, an IHG Hotel, perfectly positioned on the edge of Gordon Beach. Experience authentic Israeli breakfast at Bellissima International Restaurant, savour authentic deli sandwiches and sparkling views of the vast Mediterranean Sea at Louis Espresso Bar, plunge into the onsite pool or hit the sands and dance all night long.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Tel Aviv Beach, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 145 Hayarkon Street, Tel Aviv, Gush Dan, Israel, 63453
